casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Samuel Calleros ALVAREZ 299A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 6, 2019 Anne Bleyman, Attorney at Law, for Alvarez, Samuel Calleros. Anne Goco Kirby, M. Denise Stanford, Assistant Attorney Generals, Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of February 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of February 2019."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 13th day of March 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
